Text: video quality is good even in darker seens. audio is great and in sync. V7 a9

Sound was good, slightly blurred (to be expected) but most probably the best quality one you'll find on here. At least for the time being.

The quality seems better on my TV/Projector than it does when watching it on my computer.

V: 6.5
A: 8

Good show and very good sound.  Video is blurred and does indeed look much better on TV screen compared to laptop.. 

V: 4 max
